short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Blocks the automatic currency adjustment of Paypal..

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
It seems that it is no longer possible to deactivate the automatic currency adjustment with Paypal. Since I constantly forgot to adjust it, I developed this addon. It automatically adjusts with every payment so that no adjustment takes place.

Attention: Use at your own risk. I do not take any responsibility for actuality and function.
